description: Ready-made roast pork loin and pre-mixed slaw makes for a quick and easy roast dinner, worthy of any dinner table.
keywords: Roast pork,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Spring,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Budget,Potato,Soy free,Pork,Quick & easy lunch,Dinner Made Easy,Peanut free
name: Quick Roast Pork With Potato & Slaw Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g Simply Steam potato with butter & herb

recipeInstructions.text: Cook potatoes according to packet instructions. Set aside for 5 minutes to cool.
Meanwhile, place coleslaw kit, reserving dressing, in a bowl.
Thickly slice potatoes. Add potatoes and reserved dressing to coleslaw, tossing to combine.
Slice pork, removing and discarding string. Serve pork with coleslaw and apple sauce.
